H0.text: Dragon boat racing, as part of a complex of ceremonies, is thought to have originated where. Vietnam

H1.text: Dragon boat racing, as part of a complex of ceremonies, is thought to have originated where. Japan

H2.text: Dragon boat racing, as part of a complex of ceremonies, is thought to have originated where. Korea

H3.text: Dragon boat racing, as part of a complex of ceremonies, is thought to have originated where. 中国

A4.text: the use of dragon boats for racing and dragon ceremonies is believed by scholars, sinologists, and anthropologists to have originated in southern central China more than 2500 years ago

A5.text: Dragon boat racing has been a traditional Chinese paddled watercraft activity for over 2000 years
